languages.text: Спустя две вахты усердного труда рабочие стабилизировали друкарский корабль. Безжизненные тела ксеносов, погибших во время крушения судна, встретили проникнувших внутрь солдат. Сам корабль, будто живое существо, следовал своей омерзительной природе и жаждал насытиться людскими смертями — среагировав на присутствие чужаков, корабельные системы ожили. По всем палубам активировались смертоносные, поражающие своей жестокостью ловушки.

traits.locale_text: Спустя две вахты усердного труда рабочие стабилизировали друкарский корабль. Безжизненные тела ксеносов, погибших во время крушения судна, встретили проникнувших внутрь солдат. Сам корабль, будто живое существо, следовал своей омерзительной природе и жаждал насытиться людскими смертями — среагировав на присутствие чужаков, корабельные системы ожили. По всем палубам активировались смертоносные, поражающие своей жестокостью ловушки.

languages.text: After two watches of hard labour, the workers managed to stabilise the Drukhari voidship. The soldiers who entered the vessel were met with lifeless bodies of xenos who had died when the voidship crashed. The voidship itself, following its abominable nature, came to life, immediately craving to sate its wicked appetite for human death. The vessel's systems have reacted to the intruders, and senselessly cruel, deadly traps have been activated on all decks.
languages.original_text: Спустя две вахты усердного труда рабочие стабилизировали друкарский корабль. Безжизненные тела ксеносов, погибших во время крушения судна, встретили проникнувших внутрь солдат. Сам корабль, будто живое существо, следовал своей омерзительной природе и жаждал насытиться людскими смертями — среагировав на присутствие чужаков, корабельные системы ожили. По всем палубам активировались смертоносные, поражающие своей жестокостью ловушки.

traits.locale_text: After two watches of hard labour, the workers managed to stabilize the Drukhari voidship. The soldiers who entered the vessel were met with lifeless bodies of xenos who had died when the voidship crashed. The voidship itself, following its abominable nature, came to life craving to sate its wicked appetite for human death. The vessel's systems have reacted to the intruders, and senselessly cruel, deadly traps have sprung to action on all decks.

After two watchess of hard labour, the workers managed to stabilise the Drukhari voidship. The soldiers who entered the vessel were met with lifeless bodies of xenos who had died when the voidship crashed. The voidship itself, following its abominable nature, came to life, immediately craving to sate its wicked appetite for human death. The vessel's systems have reacted to the intruders, and senselessly cruel, deadly traps have been activated on all decks.

The soldiers who entered the vessel were met with lifeless bodies of xenos who had died when the voidship crashed. The voidship itself, following its abominable nature, came to life, immediately craving to sate its wicked appetite for human death. The vessel's systems have reacted to the intruders, and senselessly cruel, deadly traps have been activated on all decks.

After two watches of hard labour, the workers managed to stabilise the Drukhari voidship. The soldiers who entered the vessel were met with lifeless bodies of xenos who had died when the voidship crashed. The voidship itself, following its abominable nature, came to life, immediately craving to sate its wicked appetite for human death. The vessel's systems have reacted to the intruders, and senselessly cruel, deadly traps have been activated on all decks.

languages.text: 经过两巡的艰苦劳动，工人们成功稳定住了黑暗灵族的虚空舰。进入飞船的士兵们发现了虚空舰坠毁时一同毙命的异形尸体。而这艘虚空舰本身，察觉到入侵者到来之后，便遵循着它邪恶的本性，立刻活了过来，迫不及待想要满足杀死所有人类的邪恶欲望。船上的系统做出了反应，所有甲板上都启动了致命的陷阱。
languages.original_text: After two watches of hard labour, the workers managed to stabilise the Drukhari voidship. The soldiers who entered the vessel were met with lifeless bodies of xenos who had died when the voidship crashed. The voidship itself, following its abominable nature, came to life, immediately craving to sate its wicked appetite for human death. The vessel's systems have reacted to the intruders, and senselessly cruel, deadly traps have been activated on all decks.

traits.locale_text: 经过两巡的艰苦劳动，工人们成功稳定住了黑暗灵族的虚空舰。进入飞船的士兵们发现了虚空舰坠毁时一同毙命的异形尸体。而这艘虚空舰本身，察觉到入侵者到来之后，便遵循着它邪恶的本性，立刻活了过来，迫不及待想要满足杀死所有人类的邪恶欲望。船上的系统做出了反应，所有甲板上都启动了致命的陷阱。

languages.text: 労働者たちは2時間にも及ぶ過酷な労働の末、デュカーリのヴォイドシップを安定させることに成功した。船内に入った兵士たちが目にしたのは、ヴォイドシップが墜落したときに命を落とした異種族たちの無残な死体だった。ヴォイドシップはその忌まわしい本性に従い、息を吹き返し、すぐに人間の死という邪悪な食欲を満たそうと渇望した。船のシステムは侵入者に反応し、全甲板で驚くほど残酷で恐ろしい罠が作動し始めた。
languages.original_text: After two watches of hard labour, the workers managed to stabilise the Drukhari voidship. The soldiers who entered the vessel were met with lifeless bodies of xenos who had died when the voidship crashed. The voidship itself, following its abominable nature, came to life, immediately craving to sate its wicked appetite for human death. The vessel's systems have reacted to the intruders, and senselessly cruel, deadly traps have been activated on all decks.

traits.locale_text: 労働者たちは2時間にも及ぶ過酷な労働の末、デュカーリのヴォイドシップを安定させることに成功した。船内に入った兵士たちが目にしたのは、ヴォイドシップが墜落したときに命を落とした異種族たちの無残な死体だった。ヴォイドシップはその忌まわしい本性に従い、息を吹き返し、すぐに人間の死という邪悪な食欲を満たそうと渇望した。船のシステムは侵入者に反応し、全甲板で驚くほど残酷で恐ろしい罠が作動し始めた。

languages.text: Tras dos guardias de duro trabajo, los trabajadores consiguieron estabilizar la nave Drukhari. Los soldados que entraron en la nave se encontraron con los cuerpos sin vida de los xenos que habían muerto al colisionar. La propia nave, siguiendo su abominable naturaleza, cobró vida, ansiando saciar de inmediato su perverso apetito de muerte humana. Los sistemas de la nave han reaccionado ante los intrusos y se han activado trampas mortales y de una crueldad sin límites en todas las cubiertas.
languages.original_text: After two watches of hard labour, the workers managed to stabilise the Drukhari voidship. The soldiers who entered the vessel were met with lifeless bodies of xenos who had died when the voidship crashed. The voidship itself, following its abominable nature, came to life, immediately craving to sate its wicked appetite for human death. The vessel's systems have reacted to the intruders, and senselessly cruel, deadly traps have been activated on all decks.

traits.locale_text: Tras dos guardias de duro trabajo, los trabajadores consiguieron estabilizar la nave Drukhari. Los soldados que entraron en la nave se encontraron con los cuerpos sin vida de los xenos que habían muerto al colisionar. La propia nave, siguiendo su abominable naturaleza, cobró vida, ansiando saciar de inmediato su perverso apetito de muerte humana. Los sistemas de la nave han reaccionado ante los intrusos y se han activado trampas mortales y de una crueldad sin límites en todas las cubiertas.

languages.text: Nach zwei Wachschichten voll harter Arbeit gelang es den Arbeitern, das Drukhari-Raumschiff zu stabilisieren. Die Soldaten, die in das Schiff gegangen waren, fanden dort die Leichen von Xenos vor, die beim Absturz des Raumschiffs ums Leben gekommen waren. Das grauenhafte Raumschiff selbst machte seinem Wesen alle Ehre, erwachte zum Leben und trachtete augenblicklich danach, seine böse Gier nach menschlichem Tod zu stillen. Die Systeme des Schiffs haben auf die Eindringlinge reagiert, und sinnlos grausame, tödliche Fallen wurden auf allen Decks aktiviert.
languages.original_text: After two watches of hard labour, the workers managed to stabilise the Drukhari voidship. The soldiers who entered the vessel were met with lifeless bodies of xenos who had died when the voidship crashed. The voidship itself, following its abominable nature, came to life, immediately craving to sate its wicked appetite for human death. traits.locale_text: Nach zwei Wachschichten voll harter Arbeit gelang es den Arbeitern, das Drukhari-Raumschiff zu stabilisieren. Die Soldaten, die in das Schiff gegangen waren, fanden dort die Leichen von Xenos vor, die beim Absturz des Raumschiffs ums Leben gekommen waren. Das grauenhafte Raumschiff selbst machte seinem Wesen alle Ehre, erwachte zum Leben und trachtete augenblicklich danach, seine böse Gier nach menschlichem Tod zu stillen. Die Systeme des Schiffs haben auf die Eindringlinge reagiert, und sinnlos grausame, tödliche Fallen wurden auf allen Decks aktiviert.

languages.text: Après deux quarts de dur labeur, les ouvriers parviennent à stabiliser le vaisseau drukhari. Les soldats qui s'aventurent dans ses entrailles y découvrent les corps sans vie de xénos déjà morts avant la collision. Fidèle à sa conception barbare, le bâtiment s'éveille, avide d'assouvir ses appétits malsains en massacrant des humains. Réagissant à la présence des intrus, les systèmes embarqués déclenchent les nombreux pièges mortels dont ses ponts sont truffés.
languages.original_text: After two watches of hard labour, the workers managed to stabilise the Drukhari voidship. The soldiers who entered the vessel were met with lifeless bodies of xenos who had died when the voidship crashed. The voidship itself, following its abominable nature, came to life, immediately craving to sate its wicked appetite for human death. The vessel's systems have reacted to the intruders, and senselessly cruel, deadly traps have been activated on all decks.
